title: Medical simulation-based language communication competency enhancement training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and understanding of clinical processes
context.additional_context: Practical simulation training focused on patient-doctor communication and emergency response scenarios.

learning_goals: Acquiring language communication skills to accurately identify patient symptoms and medical history in a simulation environment (Achieve 90% accuracy)
Cultivating the ability to deliver clear instructions in emergency situations through VR-based scenario training (Achieve 85% success rate)
Enhancing proficiency in translating and explaining medical terminology for multicultural patients (Achieve an evaluation score of 4.0/5.0 or higher)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
